title: PH 4.5 - 4 Pendant Lamp
body: Hand-blown into an elegant shape, the Mobelaris Style of PH 4.5 - 4 Pendant Lamp of Mobelaris will complement both traditional and modern decor. Inspired by the Glare-free design from 1925 by Poul Henningsen features a large glass lamp shade with a diameter of 45 cm. The 4.5-4 fixture is designed based on the principle of a reflective three-shade system, which directs the majority of the light downwards. The PH 4.5-4 Glass Pendant is a member of the three-shade family and is one of 19 versions available today.
